wifindus.eye

Interface DeviceEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dispatcher, EyeApplication, Server

    public interface DeviceEventListener
    An object which listens for changes in the state of a Device object.
    Author:
    Mark 'marzer' Gillard

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deviceAddressChanged(Device device)
      Event fired when a Device's network address changes.
      void deviceAssignedIncident(Device device, Incident incident)
      Event fired when a Device is assigned to an Incident.
      void deviceAtmosphereChanged(Device device)
      Event fired when a Device's atmosphere details change.
      void deviceCreated(Device device)
      Event fired when a Device is first created.

      Event fired when a User is attached to (or 'logs in') to a Device.
      void deviceLocationChanged(Device device)
      Event fired when a Device's location details change.

      Event fired when a Device 'times out' (i.e.
      void deviceUnassignedIncident(Device device, Incident incident)

      Event fired when the lastUpdate property of the device is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • deviceCreated

        void deviceCreated(Device device)
        Event fired when a Device is first created.
        Parameters:
        device - The new device object.

      • deviceTimedOut

        void deviceTimedOut(Device device)
        Event fired when a Device 'times out' (i.e. when it is deemed inactive as a result of no updates being received within a set interval).
        Parameters:
        device - The inactive device object.

      • deviceInUse

        void deviceInUse(Device device,
               User user)
        Event fired when a User is attached to (or 'logs in') to a Device.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.
        user - The user logged into the device.

      • deviceNotInUse

        void deviceNotInUse(Device device,
                  User user)
        Event fired when a User is detached from (or 'logs out of') a Device.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.
        user - The user that logged out of the device.

      • deviceLocationChanged

        void deviceLocationChanged(Device device)
        Event fired when a Device's location details change.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.

      • deviceAtmosphereChanged

        void deviceAtmosphereChanged(Device device)
        Event fired when a Device's atmosphere details change.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.

      • deviceAddressChanged

        void deviceAddressChanged(Device device)
        Event fired when a Device's network address changes.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.

      • deviceUpdated

        void deviceUpdated(Device device)
        Event fired when the lastUpdate property of the device is changed.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.

      • deviceAssignedIncident

        void deviceAssignedIncident(Device device,
                          Incident incident)
        Event fired when a Device is assigned to an Incident.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.
        incident - The incident the device is now assigned to.

      • deviceUnassignedIncident

        void deviceUnassignedIncident(Device device,
                            Incident incident)
        Event fired when a Device is unassigned from an Incident.
        Parameters:
        device - The device object.
        incident - The incident the device was previously assigned to.
